api_list.name: Get
api_list.description: This endpoint gets the list of the leads
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crm39.p.rapidapi.com/users"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crm39.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: POST
api_list.description: This endpoint sends a post request
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crm39.p.rapidapi.com/users/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crm39.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: DELETE
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crm39.p.rapidapi.com/user-delete/{pk}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crm39.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.delete(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: PATCH

api_list.name: POST

import requests

url = "https://crm39.p.rapidapi.com/users/"

headers = {
